text:
Erik Lidbom is a Swedish songwriter and music producer based in Stockholm, Sweden. Lidbom is better known as a K-Pop and J-Pop composer.
Career.
Lidbom started his musical as a lyricist. In 2007, Lidbom wrote a song for a Japanese boy band "Arashi" for their J-Pop album "Time". In 2009, Lidbom composed a song "Genie" for the South Korean band "Girls’ Generation", which was well received by audiences. Lidbom wrote and produced several international hit songs with Asian artists and bands like Arashi, SHINee, Gugudan, Namie Amuro & BoA.
As of 2018, Lidbom has collaborated on more than 60 albums as a composer.
